structures

Interface SwapList<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayBasedSwapList

    public interface SwapList<T>
    A list which supports the minimal operations necessary for most in-place comparison-based sorts, along with two observers. Notably, it does not (directly) allow access to specific elements, though we've included a toString() method in ArrayBasedList for fans of caveman debugging.
    Author:
    liberato
